definition: to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: May requisition food and kitchen supplies.
sentences.chinese: 可以征用食品和厨房用品。

sentences.english: There is a striking real contradiction of land compensation in our countrys requisition of rural land.
sentences.chinese: 我国农地征用中有关土地补偿费的现实矛盾十分突出。

sentences.english: They disputed about the land for the economic and  technological development zone.
sentences.chinese: 他们对征用土地修建经济技术开发区一事进行争论。

sentences.english: A receipt of the things requisitioned shall be made out.
sentences.chinese: 实施征用应当开具征用单据。

sentences.english: A receipt of the things requisitioned shall be made out.
sentences.chinese: 实施征用应当开具征用单据。

sentences.english: The army requisitioned the citizens for food.
Requisitioned by the army during the Revolution, the buildings were used as a guard-room and a bakery.
sentences.chinese: 大革命时期农场被军队征用，用于警卫室和炊事房。

sentences.english: They proposed to conscript both capital and labour.
sentences.chinese: 他们打算把资金和劳力一起征用。

sentences.english: Will the land used to keep the water be protected from expropriation?
sentences.chinese: 已经用以留水的土地能否保证不会被征用？

sentences.english: The land for the recreation area was expropriated from local farmers.
sentences.chinese: 该娱乐区的用地是向当地农民征用的。

sentences.english: The government expropriated the land for a recreation area.
sentences.chinese: 政府征用这块土地建娱乐设施。

sentences.english: Old buses were pressed into service as emergency housing for the refugees.
sentences.chinese: 征用旧公共汽车应急来安置难民。

sentences.english: The condemnation process is not considered in the18months scheduled for row acquisition.
sentences.chinese: 依法征用过程未考虑进为路权获得预定的18个月。

sentences.english: Our college was requisitioned for hospital during the Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 在第二次世界大战期间，我们的学院被征用作为医院。

sentences.english: Much of the land for the airport was expropriated from local farmers.
sentences.chinese: 机场的土地大部分是向当地农民征用。

definition: to press into service/to impress/to commandeer
to find a place for/to help settle down/to arrange for/to get into bed/placement
to lease/to hire/to rent (sth from sb)
to commandeer/to take over for the state
able-bodied man (capable of fighting in a war)
to assign/to allocate/to transfer (money to an account)
